    ABER CARE PTE. LTD. - HEALTHCARE Vacancies Staff Nurse for Hospital & Nursing Home ( Based in Singapore)

    October 29, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    ABER CARE PTE. LTD. - HEALTHCARE is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Staff Nurse for Hospital & Nursing Home ( Based in Singapore) position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    You will be an integral part of the team in a Hospital or Nursing Home in Singapore to provide nursing care to patients.
    •  Monitor, reassess and evaluate patient’s condition, implement a plan of care for the patient Coordinate the care of patient, provide direct patient care, evaluate the patients’ conditions, and serve as the liaison between families and physicians.
    • Perform nursing care such as medication administration and wound dressing
    • Facilitate and participate in Multidisciplinary Team to provide smooth delivery of patient care and services
    • Follow up to ensure continuity of patient care and treatment plans.
    • Maintenance and update of medical files and attend to medical emergency ,ensure compliance to infection control, safety requirements and regulations.
    Job Requirements for Hospital:
    • Diploma/ Degree in Nursing
    • Registered with Malaysia Nursing Board
    • Applicant Registered with Singapore Nursing Board are welcome to apply 
    • Minimum 2 years of Nursing experience in the Hospital
    • Relevant experience in ENDOSCOPY/ OPERATING THEATRE/ ICU / A&E/ RENAL
    • Proactive and self-motivated
    • Work Location : SINGAPORE
    Job Requirements for Nursing Home  :
    • Diploma/ Degree in Nursing
    • Registered with Malaysia Nursing Board
    • Applicant Registered with Singapore Nursing Board are welcome to apply 
    • Minimum 3 years of Nursing experience in the Hospital or Nursing Home
    • With at least 3 years of APC 
    • Proactive and self-motivated
    • Possess a passionate disposition to care for seniors
    • Applicant with Prior SNB registration are welcome to apply 
    • Work Location : SINGAPORE
     Benefits :
    • Attractive Remuneration + Housing Allowance+ + Bonus+ Medical benefit + Annual Leave + various type of allowance
    • 2 years contract
    • No Placement Fee from Applicant
    Interested applicants are invited to send your updated resume in MS word format via Apply Now button below .
    Check out for more vacancies
    at http://Abercare.sg/jobs-vacancies/
    Check out abercare.sg for more detail
    Interested applicants are invited to send your updated Resume to CAREER@ABERCARE.SG
    Only Shortlisted candidate will be notified
    Abercare.sg | EA No. 18C9070 | Ong Beng Wah | Reg No. R1872190

    Company Overview

    We have many vacancies in the Hospital, Community Hospital , Nursing Home, Day Care Center, Senior Care Center, Day Dementia Care Center , SOC or Clinic.
    At Aber care, our years of experience working in healthcare organizations has given us in-depth knowledge and insight into the manpower needs of the sector.
    Check out website  www.abercare.sg for more detail or send you resume to Career@abercare.sg.  

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hospital job in Singapore.
